item.title: MIUI OS1.0.19.0.UOPCNXM Fastboot update for Redmi Note 14 Pro+ 5G China
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Redmi Note 14 Pro+ 5G China

Codename: amethyst

Version: OS1.0.19.0.UOPCNXM | 14.0

Changelog:
[System]
Optimization: Touchscreen experience
Optimization: Optimized system algorithms fix lag issues in certain scenarios
Fix: Errors and noise in call audio
Updated the security patch to October 2024. Increased system security.

Download: Here
